alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Star Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 1:29AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with isolated higher totals nearing 5 inches. Winds gusting 25 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Jackson Hole and Star Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact area commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will fall before sunrise this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
